name: tantiveiv
description: A code camp project, an application for student study

scripts.setup: yarn && cd servers/file && yarn && cd ../web && yarn && cd ../.. && yarn dev
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --prefix [{name}] --names api,file,web,mongo -c green,blue,yellow,cyan "yarn dev-start" "cd servers/file && yarn dev-start" "cd servers/web && npm run serve" "mongod --dbpath ./dbs"

author: Braysen Goodwin
